verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> [A Psalm] of David בַּֽיהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> In the LORD חָסִ֗יתִי <S%H2620><s%> put I my trust אֵ֭יךְ <S%H349><s%> How תֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> how say לְנַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> ye to my soul [נוּדוּ כ] (נ֝֗וּדִי <S%H5110><s%> bemoan ק) הַרְכֶ֥ם <S%H2022><s%> to your mountain צִפּֽוֹר׃ <S%H6833><s%> [as] a bird

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For הִנֵּ֪ה <S%H2009><s%> behold הָרְשָׁעִ֡ים <S%H7563><s%> For lo the wicked יִדְרְכ֬וּן <S%H1869><s%> bend קֶ֗שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> [their] bow כּוֹנְנ֣וּ <S%H3559><s%> they make ready חִצָּ֣ם <S%H2671><s%> their arrow עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon יֶ֑תֶר <S%H3499><s%> upon the string לִיר֥וֹת <S%H3384><s%> shoot בְּמוֹ־ <S%H1119><s%> for אֹ֝֗פֶל <S%H652><s%> darkness לְיִשְׁרֵי־ <S%H3477><s%> at the upright לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> in heart

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> If הַ֭שָּׁתוֹת <S%H8356><s%> If the foundations יֵֽהָרֵס֑וּן <S%H2040><s%> be destroyed צַ֝דִּ֗יק <S%H6662><s%> what can the righteous מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What פָּעָֽל׃ <S%H6466><s%> do

יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD בְּֽהֵ֘יכַ֤ל <S%H1964><s%> temple קָדְשׁ֗וֹ <S%H6944><s%> [is] in his holy יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD'S בַּשָּׁמַ֪יִם <S%H8064><s%> [is] in heaven כִּ֫סְא֥וֹ <S%H3678><s%> throne עֵינָ֥יו <S%H5869><s%> his eyes יֶחֱז֑וּ <S%H2372><s%> behold עַפְעַפָּ֥יו <S%H6079><s%> his eyelids יִ֝בְחֲנ֗וּ <S%H974><s%> try בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> of men

יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD צַדִּ֪יק <S%H6662><s%> the righteous יִ֫בְחָ֥ן <S%H974><s%> trieth וְ֭רָשָׁע <S%H7563><s%> but the wicked וְאֹהֵ֣ב <S%H157><s%> and him that loveth חָמָ֑ס <S%H2555><s%> violence שָֽׂנְאָ֥ה <S%H8130><s%> hateth נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H5315><s%> his soul

יַמְטֵ֥ר <S%H4305><s%> he shall rain עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon רְשָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> Upon the wicked פַּ֫חִ֥ים <S%H6341><s%> snares אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire וְ֭גָפְרִית <S%H1614><s%> and brimstone וְר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> tempest זִלְעָפ֗וֹת <S%H2152><s%> and an horrible מְנָ֣ת <S%H4521><s%> [this shall be] the portion כּוֹסָֽם׃ <S%H3563><s%> of their cup

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for צַדִּ֣יק <S%H6662><s%> For the righteous יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> LORD צְדָק֣וֹת <S%H6666><s%> righteousness אָהֵ֑ב <S%H157><s%> loveth יָ֝שָׁ֗ר <S%H3477><s%> the upright יֶחֱז֥וּ <S%H2372><s%> doth behold פָנֵֽימוֹ׃ <S%H6440><s%> his countenance
